member.name: T:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddCourseViewModel
member.summary: A view model class for adding a new course

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddCourseViewModel.CourseID
member.summary: Course ID of this course For example: T-514-VEFT

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddCourseViewModel.Semester
member.summary: Specifies which semester this particular course is in. For example: 20153 would mean that it the course is from the year 2015, and it's the third semester of the year. With Spring being first, summer second and autumn third, 20153 would mean Autumn 2015.

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddCourseViewModel.MaxStudents
member.summary: A number specifying the maximum number of students allowed to enroll in the course.

member.name: T:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddStudentToCourseViewModel
member.summary: A view model for adding an existing student to a course or the waiting list for a course.

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.AddStudentToCourseViewModel.SSN
member.summary: Social security number of this student

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.CourseDetailsDTO.Students
member.summary: A list of students enrolled in the course

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.CourseDetailsDTO.MaxStudents
member.summary: A number specifying the maximum number of students allowed to enroll in the course.

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.CourseDTO.StudentCount
member.summary: The number students enrolled in the course

member.name: T:SimpleWebAPI.Models.UpdateCourseViewModel
member.summary: A view model classing for updating an existing course.

member.name: P:SimpleWebAPI.Models.UpdateCourseViewModel.MaxStudents
member.summary: A number specifying the maximum number of students allowed to enroll in the course.
